message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but $120 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go right now. How about $105?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110. What do you think?
